EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 3: Connect with an HGuide E
EmailTemplate.subject: Connect with an HGuide Inertial Sensors Engineer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Did you know that our HGuide engineers are here to help?
From testing to integration, our engineering team is knowledgeable and has decades of experience in inertial sensing and navigation.
Let us help you optimize the performance of our products.
To speak to an HGuide engineer, you can email us at HGuide.support@honeywell.com <[[mailto:HGuide.support@honeywell.com]]>.
Please let us know if thereâ€™s anything we can do to help.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team
